name: File Disorder
description:
File Disorder was made for the Discord Jam #3, a 48 hour game jam.
Even still, I only had 24 hours to make it, so here is my best effort to polish something so unfinished.

Controls: Mouse for everything, unless you use your computer with a drawing tablet, in which case you deserve a prize, or something.

This game checks, creates, and deletes files in your computer, so you may need to run as admin for it to work.

Music included: Neo Western by Kevin MacLeod (https://bit.ly/2Q9QHO1)

Thanks for playing and reporting bugs, because we all know there will be about a hundred in this thing.
